# performAction(forItem:)

**Instance Method**

Invoked when the user selects a search result in Help menu.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func performAction(forItem item: Any)
```

## Parameters

- **item**: An item in the help menu.

## Discussion

The default implementation brings up Help Viewer for a Help item.

## Search Help Content

- **searchForItems(withSearch:resultLimit:matchedItemHandler:)**: Search for the specified items, with the result limit.

items.description: Search for the specified items, with the result limit.
items.name: searchForItems(withSearch:resultLimit:matchedItemHandler:)
